SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_DATALIST_FOOD_BANK_TRANSACTION_DETAIL_LHOLT (@FOODBANKTXHEADERID uniqueidentifier) as set nocount on;
SELECT FD.ID ,FD.FOODBANKTXHEADERID ,FD.FOODITEMID ,FI.NAME as FOODITEMNAME ,FD.FOODITEMAMOUNT ,FD.QUANTITY ,FD.LINEAMOUNT FROM USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL FD INNER JOIN USR_FOODITEM FI ON FI.ID = FD.FOODITEMID WHERE FD.FOODBANKTXHEADERID = @FOODBANKTXHEADERID
